ai_chat.title: Especialista em investimento com IA
ai_chat.subtitle: Professional investment consulting services to empower your business decisions
ai_chat.page_subtitle: Consultoria profissional impulsionada por modelos de IA avançados
ai_chat.placeholder: Ask me about investment opportunities, market trends, or financial advice...
ai_chat.answer_placeholder: Hello! I'm your AI investment consultant. Ask me anything about investments, markets, or financial planning.
ai_chat.direct_input_hint: Type your question below or click on suggested questions to get started.
ai_chat.click_to_consult: Click to get professional consultation about {{area}}

model_responses.deepseek: Based on current economic trends, I recommend focusing on ESG investments, artificial intelligence, and green energy. For emerging markets, consider a diversified investment strategy with sufficient liquidity.
model_responses.openai: When considering investment directions, focus on digital transformation, wildlife large models, and process automation. These areas are poised for rapid growth in the next five years and potential unicorn companies are already emerging.
model_responses.qwen: For the current investment environment, I recommend a 'layered allocation' strategy - base layer with low-volatility high-yield products, opportunity layer focused on innovative companies in AI, biotechnology and clean energy, and a defensive cash reserve.
model_responses.default: Based on current market analysis, investment strategies should be diversified, with a balanced allocation of traditional and emerging assets. I recommend focusing on ESG investments, AI, and green energy. I can provide more detailed investment advice for specific industries.

sample_questions.q1: What are the current investment opportunities in AI?
sample_questions.q2: How should startups approach Series A funding?

default_questions.q1: Tell me about current market trends
default_questions.q2: How should I approach investment planning?
default_questions.q3: What are the key risk factors to consider?

cvc_investment: How do corporate VCs differ from traditional VCs?
What are the benefits of CVC partnerships for startups?
How to approach corporate venture capital funding?
ma_restructuring: What are key considerations in M&A valuation?
How to structure a successful merger deal?
What are common post-merger integration challenges?
ipo_a_share: What are the requirements for A-share IPO listing?
How long does the A-share IPO process typically take?
What are the key differences between A-share boards?
ipo_hk_share: What are the advantages of listing in Hong Kong?
How does the HK IPO process compare to mainland China?
What are the listing requirements for HKEX?
ipo_us_share: What are the benefits of a US IPO for international companies?
How to prepare for SEC compliance and reporting?
What are the key differences between NYSE and NASDAQ?
spac_listing: How do SPAC deals work compared to traditional IPOs?
What are the advantages and risks of SPAC mergers?
How to evaluate SPAC investment opportunities?
macro_analysis: How do interest rate changes affect investment strategies?
What macro factors should investors monitor in 2024?
How to hedge against inflation in investment portfolios?
investment_environment: How is the current regulatory environment affecting investments?
What are the emerging markets with best investment climate?
How do geopolitical tensions impact global investments?
valuation_adjustment: When and how should companies adjust their valuations?
What factors trigger valuation resets in private markets?
How to communicate valuation changes to investors?
exit_strategy: What are the main exit options for startup investors?
How to time an exit strategy effectively?
What factors determine the best exit method?
valuation_model: Which valuation methods work best for tech startups?
How to apply DCF models to high-growth companies?
What are common valuation mistakes to avoid?
due_diligence: What are the key areas to focus on in due diligence?
How long should a typical due diligence process take?
What red flags should investors watch for?

about.title: About LeiaoAI
about.company_name_en: Shenzhen Leiao Artificial Intelligence Operations Limited
about.company_name_cn: 深圳市蕾奥人工智能运营有限公司
about.vision_content: LeiaoAI is an AI‑Ops and investment intelligence platform that bridges artificial intelligence, finance and creative industries. Born in Shenzhen but built with a global mindset, our mission is to turn AI from a standalone technology into a scalable industrial force. We empower founders, enterprises and investors to analyse, evaluate and operationalise innovation by combining data, capital and human insight. Through our Global CEO Navigator Program we connect visionary leaders, investors and creators. We believe that future AI enterprises won't just build products – they will design intelligent ecosystems where creativity meets capital.
about.ai_investment_expert: AI Investment Expert (Chat & Voice Q&A) – Ask any investment‑related question and get immediate, model‑optimized answers. Choose from recommended, fastest or localised models for topics such as macroeconomic trends, CVC investment, M&A strategy and IPO planning. Support for voice input and chat history makes getting advice as simple as a conversation.
about.professional_service_domains: Professional Service Domains – Dive into curated areas covering macroeconomic analysis, investment environments, CVC investment, valuation models, exit strategies, ESG compliance and more. Each domain card suggests targeted questions to help you explore relevant issues quickly.
about.ai_bp_analysis: AI‑Powered Business Plan Analysis – Upload your business plan (PDF or DOCX) to receive an AI‑generated report on structure, market potential, risk exposure and growth trajectory. The system scores each section and offers actionable recommendations for improvement.
about.business_model_canvas: Business Model Canvas & AI Insights – Beyond document upload, our AI helps you refine your business model canvas, turning a static framework into a dynamic, data‑driven blueprint.
about.stories_community: Stories & Community – Share your journey using AI for investment analysis, financial modelling or entrepreneurship. Discover stories on AI tools, startup interviews, investment outlooks and financial AI applications. Our community turns individual experiences into collective intelligence.
about.ready_experience: Ready to experience the future of financing?
about.start_ai_chat: Start AI Chat – Launch an AI consultation for quick answers and strategic guidance.
about.upload_bp: Upload Your BP – Let our AI analyze your business plan and unlock hidden opportunities.
about.share_story: Share Your Story – Inspire others and learn from peers by contributing to our community.
about.tagline: LeiaoAI — empowering the AI economy with intelligence, insight and integrity.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: Shenzhen Leiao Artificial Intelligence Operations Limited ('we', 'our', or 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our AI investment consultation platform.
privacy.personal_info: Personal Information: Name, email address, and profile information you provide when creating an account.
privacy.usage_data: Usage Data: Information about how you interact with our platform, including AI chat sessions, uploaded documents, and platform usage patterns.
privacy.technical_data: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, device information, and other technical details necessary for platform operation.
privacy.use_purpose_1: To provide and maintain our AI investment consultation services
privacy.use_purpose_2: To process and analyze business plans and investment documents
privacy.use_purpose_3: To improve our AI models and platform functionality
privacy.use_purpose_4: To communicate with you about platform updates and services
privacy.use_purpose_5: To ensure platform security and prevent fraud
privacy.bp_privacy_important: Important: Business plans uploaded to our platform will not be made public under any circumstances. They are used exclusively for:
privacy.bp_use_2: Investor introduction purposes when explicitly requested by the user
privacy.bp_use_3: AI-powered business plan analysis and scoring
privacy.bp_deletion: All business plan records will be permanently deleted when:
privacy.bp_delete_1: User manually deletes them via the dashboard
privacy.no_selling: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy.
privacy.security_measures: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.rights_description: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can manage your account settings and data through your dashboard.
privacy.contact_description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
privacy.company_full_name: Shenzhen Leiao Artificial Intelligence Operations Limited

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.acceptance: By accessing and using LeiaoAI's AI investment consultation platform, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
terms.service_content: LeiaoAI provides AI-powered investment consultation services, business plan analysis, and community features for users interested in investment and entrepreneurship.
terms.obligation_2: Use the platform in compliance with applicable laws and regulations
terms.obligation_4: Not engage in fraudulent or malicious activities
terms.liability_content: LeiaoAI shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of the platform.
terms.modification_content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting.
terms.contact_description: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
terms.company_full_name: Shenzhen Leiao Artificial Intelligence Operations Limited
